# Register for the Code Retreats [8th December 2023](https://forms.gle/UAMxQeDdmBTcgsLt7) and [25th January 2024](https://forms.gle/2LsvUvb6SY39ppSd8)

Info about the Code Retreats

Our next Code Retreats will take place 12 till 2 pm on Friday 8th December 2023 via zoom and 11:00 am till 2pm on Thursday 25th January 2024 at the University of York. Our instructors will be on hand to help you problem-solve the issues that arise as you work. For the event in January lunch will be provided and funding is available to support travel to the Code Retreat.

Cloud-SPAN Alumni please register here for the Code Retreats [8th December 2023](https://forms.gle/UAMxQeDdmBTcgsLt7) and [25th January 2024](https://forms.gle/2LsvUvb6SY39ppSd8)

## What could you achieve?

-   Working with your peers and with help from our instructors, you could:
-   Revise our Metagenomics course
-   Get help organising and documenting your own analysis
-   Apply tools taught in Metagenomics to your own data
-   Get help with Creating your own Amazon Web Services instance for Genomics
-   Network with other genomics researchers

## Pre-requisites

-   Attendees should have completed the a Cloud-SPAN course
-   Attendees will need to bring their own laptop to this event

## Scholarships

We offer scholarships to enable members of underrepresented groups and those with financial difficulties to participate in our code retreats.

The scholarship scheme can cover approximately Â£150 per application, for costs such as:

- childcare
- accessibility needs
- other costs that might otherwise prevent participation

You will need to reclaim these expenses by completing a form and submitting receipts after participation in the retreat.

To request a scholarship please indicate this in the registration form at least one week before the event is scheduled to take place.
